## 14. Cohort Default Rates: Aspirational Institutions

```{r 14.1.2}
ft_default_aspire      <- flextable(dt14_default_aspire
) %>%
  colformat_num(
    j                  = 2:10,
    digits             = 2, 
    na_str             = "", 
    suffix             = "%"
  ) %>%
  fit_to_width(max_width = 8.50
  ) %>%           
  theme_booktabs(fontsize = 8.0)
ft_default_aspire
```
